description: This file defines the SocialAccountService class in C#, implementing the ISocialAccountService interface. It manages social account connections for users, including connecting new accounts, listing user accounts, and disconnecting accounts. It interacts with a database context and performs asynchronous database operations.

classes.name: SocialAccountService
classes.description: Implements user social account management including connecting, listing, and disconnecting social accounts.

methods.name: ConnectAsync
methods.description: Creates and associates a new social account for a user asynchronously, then returns its details.

methods.name: ListAsync
methods.description: Retrieves all social accounts associated with a specific user asynchronously.

methods.name: DisconnectAsync
methods.description: Removes a linked social account for a user asynchronously; returns true if successful.
